name: CKEditor Cloudinary Image Upload Adapter
description: I built this node library to help upload embedded reich text images from CKEditor to cloudinary on the fly.

name: SBMK
description: I have done quite a bit of work with the slack API building bots and apps that automate processes in workspaces. This Slack Block Message Kit library helps you build slack message components with some validations.

name: Tiddy
description: I go tired of telling folks to post their messages in the right channels on slack, so I built this tool that moves messages automatically based on user reactions after a little setup.

name: Kid Math
description: When I was starting out a few years ago, I built this simply arithmetic game for kids.
